1557806.folder: Brooklyn & 112 Schermerhorn Street & Boerum Place & Smith Street, Brooklyn, NY
1557806.title: Brooklyn - 112 Schermerhorn Street - Boerum Place - Smith Street

706637f-a.folder: Schermerhorn Street & Smith Street, Brooklyn, NY
706637f-a.text:
(1)
Schermerhorn Street, north side, aoross subway excavation, east fron
Smith Street, showing the Abraham & Straus Building.
April 13, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing also Smith Street, and taken from site for Central Courts Building, at the S.W. corner of Smith and Schermerhorn
Streets.
October 5, 1929.
L. Sperr.

706638f-a.folder: Schermerhorn Street & Smith Street, Brooklyn, NY
706638f-a.text:
(1)
Schermerhorn Street, east from Smith Street, across excavation for
Eighth Ave., Subway of the Independent Lines.
June 1, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, almost three years later, showing excavation filled
in.
April 7, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.

706802f-a.folder: Smith Street & Schermerhorn Street, Brooklyn, NY
706802f-a.text:
Smith Street, at the S.E. corner of Schermerhorn Street, showing Shields Hall formerly known as the Saenger Bund Hall, demolished in or before 1929.
1922.
Eugene L Armbruster Collection.
